attributes.action: Reinstate capital punishment (the Death sentence) for Murder, and other capital crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the goody goodies; PC crews of the world have had there way for far too many years, and the proof of the pudding is in the eating. It doesn't work.Allow the alledged defendant 5 years to prove there innocence Max then hang them or any other way. Just remember it costs the UK tax payer £30k a year for each prisoner. Wake up to the reality. hang them, save on prisons, staff and police time as well as supposed rehabilitation

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reinstate capital punishment (the Death sentence) for Murder, and other capital crimes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15524.asp

Prime Minister's Office
